name: Format VBS SQL query for SQL
description:
Simply removes every VBS characters leaving only the SQL query ready to use.
Usefull with http://www.regexr.com/39jpi
content:
"SELECT Table1.Value1, Table3.Value2, Table2.Value3,  " & _ 
"       Table2.Value4  " & _ 
"  FROM (Table1 " & _ 
" INNER JOIN Table2 " & _ 
"    ON Table1.Value5 = Table2.Value5) " & _ 
" INNER JOIN Table3 " & _ 
"    ON Table1.Value6 = Table3.Value6 " & _ 
" ORDER BY Table1.Value1 "
author: Goodspeed
